questions.question: How can you check if a variable is an array in JavaScript?
What does WCAG stand for in the context of web accessibility?
What is the purpose of alternative text (alt attribute) for images in HTML?
options: To provide a description for screen readers
To hide the image from users

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define a logical structure and hierarchy for web content?
What is the purpose of ARIA (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) in web development?
options: To improve user interactions for people with disabilities

questions.question: How can you ensure a website is accessible to users with color blindness?
options: By using only black and white colors
By avoiding the use of color alone to convey information
By using vibrant and contrasting colors
By using images instead of text

questions.question: What is the purpose of semantic HTML elements (e.g., <header>, <nav>, <article>)?
options: To add decorative elements to the page
To structure content and provide meaning

questions.question: Why is it important to provide keyboard navigation on a website?
options: To speed up the website loading time
To make the website accessible to users with mobility impairments

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'tabindex' attribute in HTML?
options: To set the tab order of elements for keyboard navigation
To control the visibility of elements
To create tabs in the browser
To set the color of text

questions.question: How can you create a focus indicator for interactive elements in CSS?
options: By default, browsers provide a focus indicator
Adding a border to the element

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'aria-live' attribute in ARIA?
options: To define the live streaming content on a webpage
To notify screen readers of dynamically changing content
To control the live video playback
To style elements based on user interactions

questions.question: What is the role of screen readers in web accessibility?
options: To capture screenshots of web pages
To provide voice commands for users
To translate web content to different languages
To read aloud the content of a webpage for users with visual impairments

questions.question: How can you create accessible forms in HTML?
options: By providing clear and concise labels for form elements
By avoiding the use of forms altogether

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'role' attribute in ARIA?
options: To set the color of an element
To define the role or purpose of an element for accessibility
To control the visibility of an element

questions.question: How can you provide a text alternative for multimedia content?
options: By using a small font size
By using descriptive text or captions
By using bright and flashy colors

questions.question: Why is it important to ensure that web content is navigable with a keyboard?
options: To make the website accessible to users with motor disabilities

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'aria-label' attribute in ARIA?
options: To label HTML elements for styling
To add decorative elements to the page
To provide an accessible name for an element
To create labeled sections in a document

questions.question: How can you create a skip navigation link to improve accessibility?
options: By using a large font size
By adding a 'skip' class to elements
By including a hidden link at the beginning of the page

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'aria-hidden' attribute in ARIA?
options: To hide content from sighted users
To make an element visible to screen readers
To add decorative elements to the page
To control the background color of an element

questions.question: How can you optimize a website for users with cognitive disabilities?
options: By using complex language and jargon
By providing clear and simple navigation
By using bright and contrasting colors

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'aria-describedby' attribute in ARIA?
options: To provide additional information for screen readers
To change the font size of an element
To set the background color of an element
To define a unique identifier for an element
